comments: With offset 1, decimal expansion of sqrt(5/2). - _Eric Desbiaux_, May 01 2008sqrt(5/2) appears as a coordinate in a degree-5 integration formula on 13 points in the unit sphere [Stroud & Secrest] . - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 12 2011With offset 2, decimal expansion of sqrt(250). - _Michel Marcus_, Nov 04 2013
